name: Hold & Release
description:
This is a simple, one-button game, which the aim is to launch balls and hit as many randomly generated targets as possible within 5 misses.

Key Features:

 - Only one button.

- Pretty challenging game play.

- Aim, Launch, Score

The Bitbucket Link:

 - https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/gs-han_game-a-week-1/src/master/

Release Notes:

 - ver1.0 (Complete Game)

Credits:

 - Geumseong Han

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
